title: Battery percentage sticking and then jumping, shows a question mark or 50% when charging.
content: Have reset device and also updated to android 11. No apps are showing a battery drain in battery usage and I haven't downloaded any new apps that could cause the issue. On two consecutive days it would freeze at 25-30% charge and then suddenly jump to was than 5% without any warning.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
